title: Roll back to Version 21

requirements.text: Revert all changes from Version 22 deployment to restore Version 21 functionality

quotes: Actor not available error when trying to upload files
roll back to Version 21 to restore the working state

acceptanceCriteria: File upload functionality works without 'Actor not available' error
Backend actor is properly accessible from frontend
All features that worked in Version 21 are restored

constraints: Must restore exact working state of Version 21
Must not introduce any new changes beyond rollback
nonGoals: Fixing the dark theme feature from Version 22
